name: Wars of Dragon Warrior 2016 Adventure – Ultimate Clash of Dragons with Knight Clan in the Medieval City
name_original: Wars of Dragon Warrior 2016 Adventure – Ultimate Clash of Dragons with Knight Clan in the Medieval City
description:
Time Travel to the Dragon Glory and fantasy of the mythical creatures of Berk Island. Welcome to the epic war world of monstrous cliffs, fire-breathing dragons and a Viking warrior empire.

Turn the ultimate fantasy dream into reality with whispering screaming death in the dragon land.
Play the Ultimate dragon simulator where epic wars are raging at the fortresses of Viking medieval city. The Grotesque creature is nesting on the deadly cliffs surrounding the isle of berk. Spread the gigantic wings and take off towards the weapon store and attack the barrels filled with armory. Attack the kingdom from the air with enormous fire balls.

Hunt the knights, archers and dragonslayers guarding the gates of the medieval city fort. Look out for the poisonous arrows they shoot. Protect yourself by swishing your powerful tail.
Enjoy the battles amongst the archer, knight and dragon.

War of Dragon Warrior 2016 Features:
• Play as a True Dragon warrior
• Wide variety of dragons.
• Realistic savage reptiles
• Deadly charisma and powerful fire-breathing.
• Attack all the dragon slayers at the enchanted Viking fort
• Mark the city as your dragon hangar.
• HD graphics of medieval city with grand forts

Install the latest adventure of dragon war game.
Face the virtual reality of toothless terror and action RPG in the Wars of Dragon simulator.
